eligibility.notes: Health declaration not required; risk assessment based on vehicle value

rate_table.notes: 4% of vehicle value (example for KES 1.5M vehicle)

premium.rate_table_notes: Premiums based on vehicle value, age, and usage; 4% rate for comprehensive. Installment options available.

sample_examples.example: KES 60,000 annual for KES 1.5M comprehensive cover (4% rate).

benefits: Third-party liability (KES 5M property, unlimited bodily injury)

provider_network.garages: Wide network for cashless repairs (e.g., CMC Motors, Toyota Kenya)

claims_process.notes: Online reporting via app; cashless at network garages

customer_reviews.comment: Flexible payments with monthly installments, claims settled in 10 days (@UserKE, Feb 2025)
Good coverage but some delays in complex claims (2024)

sources.title: APA Motor Private Insurance - Official Page

premium.rate_table_notes: Premiums based on property value and location; discounts for fire-safe materials.

sample_examples.example: KES 25,000/year for KES 5M building + KES 1M contents.

benefits: Building and contents against fire, theft, burglary
Embedded travel insurance (up to USD 40,000 emergency abroad)

customer_reviews.comment: Comprehensive home cover with embedded travel benefit (2024)

metadata.target_market: individual travellers, families, business trips, tourists

premium.rate_table_notes: Premiums vary by duration, destination, and age; quotes via portal.

customer_reviews.comment: Comprehensive worldwide cover for business trips (@TravelerKE, Jan 2025)

metadata.product_name: Family Health Cover (Jamii Plus / Afya Nafuu)

eligibility.notes: Pre-existing covered after 12 months; term babies from 38 weeks

premium.rate_table_notes: Tiered plans; premiums vary by age, family size, and add-ons. Outpatient/maternity separate.

sample_examples.example: KES 4,661/year for KES 750K inpatient (Afya Nafuu Basic individual).
KES 150,000/year for family of 4 (Jamii Plus up to KES 10M).

exclusions: Waiting periods: 30 days illness, 12 months pre-existing/chronic/maternity

customer_reviews.comment: Afya Nafuu covered chronic conditions fully after waiting period (@FamilyKE, Jan 2025)
Good family cover but waiting periods strict (2024)
